trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: Exemplaren van andere typen worden geconverteerd naar en uit <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"> </xref> exemplaren.

trans-unit.source: GridLengthConverter supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
trans-unit.target: GridLengthConverter ondersteuning biedt voor conversie naar en van de volgende typen: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal> <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double> <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32> <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16> <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.</xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a class can be converted from a given type to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt bepaald of een klasse vanuit een bepaald type kan worden geconverteerd naar een exemplaar van <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.GridLengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
